name: Pesto Pasta
description: Herby pasta tossed in fresh pesto.
instructions: 1. Cook pasta in salted water. 2. Blend basil, garlic, pine nuts, parmesan, and olive oil. 3. Drain pasta and toss with pesto. 4. Adjust seasoning and serve.

name: Beef Burrito
description: Hearty wrap filled with seasoned beef.
instructions: 1. Cook beef with onion and spices. 2. Warm tortillas and prepare rice and beans. 3. Fill tortillas with ingredients. 4. Roll tightly and serve.

name: Palak Paneer
description: Spinach curry with soft cheese cubes.
instructions: 1. Blanch and blend spinach into a puree. 2. Saut√© onion, garlic, and ginger. 3. Add spices and spinach puree and simmer. 4. Add paneer and cream and serve.

name: Chicken Katsu
description: Crispy breaded chicken cutlet.
instructions: 1. Pound and season chicken. 2. Coat with flour, egg, and panko. 3. Fry until golden and cooked through. 4. Slice and serve with sauce.

name: Mac and Cheese
description: Creamy baked pasta with cheese sauce.
instructions: 1. Cook macaroni until tender. 2. Make a roux with butter and flour and add milk. 3. Stir in cheese until smooth. 4. Combine with pasta and bake briefly.

name: Thai Basil Chicken
description: Spicy stir-fry with fragrant basil.
instructions: 1. Stir-fry garlic and chili in oil. 2. Add chicken and cook through. 3. Season with sauces. 4. Toss in basil and serve over rice.

name: French Onion Soup
description: Rich soup with caramelized onions and cheese.
instructions: 1. Slowly caramelize onions in butter. 2. Add broth and thyme and simmer. 3. Toast bread and top with cheese. 4. Serve soup with cheesy toast on top.

name: Japchae
description: Glass noodles stir-fried with vegetables.
instructions: 1. Cook noodles and set aside. 2. Stir-fry beef and vegetables separately. 3. Combine everything in a pan. 4. Season with soy sauce, sugar, and sesame oil.

name: Stuffed Grape Leaves
description: Rice-filled leaves with herbs and lemon.
instructions: 1. Mix rice with onion, dill, and seasoning. 2. Place filling in leaves and roll tightly. 3. Arrange in pot and add water and lemon. 4. Simmer until rice is cooked.

name: Beef Chow Fun
description: Wide noodles stir-fried with beef.
instructions: 1. Sear beef in hot pan and remove. 2. Stir-fry noodles with oil and soy sauce. 3. Add sprouts and scallions. 4. Return beef, toss, and serve.

name: Lemongrass Chicken
description: Fragrant grilled chicken with citrus notes.
instructions: 1. Blend lemongrass with garlic, fish sauce, sugar, and oil. 2. Marinate chicken. 3. Grill or pan-fry until cooked through. 4. Rest briefly and serve.

name: Scotch Eggs
description: Boiled eggs wrapped in sausage and fried.
instructions: 1. Boil eggs and peel them. 2. Wrap each egg in sausage meat. 3. Bread with flour, egg, and crumbs. 4. Fry until golden and cooked.

name: Cacio e Pepe
description: Peppery pasta with simple cheese sauce.
instructions: 1. Cook spaghetti in salted water. 2. Toast black pepper in a pan. 3. Add pasta water and cheese to make a sauce. 4. Toss pasta until creamy.

name: Tostadas
description: Crispy tortillas topped with savory fillings.
instructions: 1. Warm tostada shells. 2. Spread beans on each shell. 3. Top with chicken, lettuce, and tomato. 4. Sprinkle cheese and serve.

name: Chicken Biryani
description: Spiced rice layered with tender chicken.
instructions: 1. Parboil rice with spices. 2. Cook chicken with onion and yogurt. 3. Layer rice and chicken in a pot. 4. Steam until flavors meld and serve.

name: Miso Soup
description: Light soup with tofu and seaweed.
instructions: 1. Heat dashi until hot but not boiling. 2. Dissolve miso paste in the broth. 3. Add tofu and wakame. 4. Garnish with scallions and serve.

name: Pulled Pork Sandwich
description: Slow-cooked pork in a soft bun.
instructions: 1. Season and slow-cook pork until tender. 2. Shred meat with forks. 3. Mix with barbecue sauce. 4. Serve on buns with coleslaw.

name: Drunken Noodles
description: Spicy stir-fried noodles with basil.
instructions: 1. Soak noodles until soft. 2. Stir-fry garlic and chili in oil. 3. Add chicken and cook. 4. Add noodles, sauce, and basil and toss.

name: Steak Frites
description: Seared steak served with crispy fries.
instructions: 1. Cut and fry potatoes until golden. 2. Season and sear steak to desired doneness. 3. Baste steak with butter and garlic. 4. Serve steak with fries.

name: Korean Pancakes
description: Savory vegetable pancakes with dipping sauce.
instructions: 1. Mix flour, water, and salt into a batter. 2. Stir in vegetables. 3. Fry spoonfuls in oil until crisp. 4. Serve with soy sauce for dipping.

name: Spanakopita
description: Flaky pastry filled with spinach and feta.
instructions: 1. Saut√© onion and spinach and let cool. 2. Mix with feta and egg. 3. Layer phyllo with oil and add filling. 4. Bake until golden and crisp.

name: Char Siu
description: Sweet roasted Chinese barbecue pork.
instructions: 1. Mix marinade and coat pork. 2. Marinate for several hours. 3. Roast until cooked and glazed. 4. Rest, slice, and serve.

name: Chicken Pho
description: Comforting noodle soup with chicken.
instructions: 1. Simmer chicken with ginger and onion to make broth. 2. Remove chicken and shred it. 3. Cook noodles and place in bowls with chicken. 4. Pour broth over and add herbs and lime.

name: Beef Pie
description: Savory pie with rich beef filling.
instructions: 1. Brown beef with onion and carrot. 2. Add gravy and simmer until tender. 3. Transfer to dish and top with pastry. 4. Bake until pastry is golden.

name: Gnocchi with Tomato Sauce
description: Soft potato dumplings in simple sauce.
instructions: 1. Boil gnocchi until they float. 2. Warm tomato sauce with garlic and olive oil. 3. Toss gnocchi with sauce. 4. Garnish with basil and parmesan.

name: Chicken Fajitas
description: Sizzling chicken with peppers and onions.
instructions: 1. Slice chicken and vegetables. 2. Stir-fry in hot pan with oil and spices. 3. Squeeze lime over mixture. 4. Serve in warm tortillas.

name: Vegetable Korma
description: Mild creamy curry with mixed vegetables.
instructions: 1. Saut√© onion, garlic, and ginger. 2. Add spices and vegetables and cook briefly. 3. Pour in coconut milk and simmer. 4. Cook until vegetables are tender and serve.

name: Yakitori
description: Grilled chicken skewers with sweet glaze.
instructions: 1. Cut chicken into bite-size pieces. 2. Thread onto skewers. 3. Grill while brushing with sauce. 4. Cook until glazed and serve.

name: Clam Chowder
description: Creamy soup with clams and potatoes.
instructions: 1. Cook bacon until crisp and set aside. 2. Saut√© onion and celery in butter. 3. Add potatoes, clams, and liquid and simmer. 4. Stir in cream and bacon and serve.

name: Thai Red Curry
description: Rich curry with coconut milk and spices.
instructions: 1. Heat curry paste in a pan. 2. Add coconut milk and bring to simmer. 3. Add chicken and vegetables and cook through. 4. Season and add basil before serving.

name: Duck Confit
description: Slow-cooked duck in its own fat.
instructions: 1. Season duck legs with salt and herbs. 2. Submerge in duck fat in a pot. 3. Cook slowly until tender. 4. Crisp skin before serving.

name: Kimchi Stew
description: Spicy stew with kimchi and pork.
instructions: 1. Saut√© pork with garlic. 2. Add kimchi and cook briefly. 3. Pour in broth and add tofu. 4. Simmer and garnish with scallions.

name: Moussaka
description: Layered casserole with eggplant and meat.
instructions: 1. Fry eggplant slices until soft. 2. Cook beef with onion and tomato sauce. 3. Layer eggplant and meat in a dish. 4. Top with bechamel and bake until golden.

name: Wonton Soup
description: Clear broth with filled dumplings.
instructions: 1. Bring broth to a gentle boil with ginger. 2. Add wontons and cook until they float. 3. Season with soy sauce. 4. Garnish with scallions and serve.

name: Vietnamese Caramel Pork
description: Sweet savory pork braised in caramel sauce.
instructions: 1. Melt sugar to make caramel in a pot. 2. Add pork and sear in caramel. 3. Add fish sauce, garlic, and water and simmer. 4. Cook until tender and glazed.

name: Ploughman's Lunch
description: Cold plate with cheese, bread, and pickles.
instructions: 1. Slice cheese and bread. 2. Arrange on a plate with pickles and apple. 3. Add butter on the side. 4. Serve as a simple cold meal.

name: Caprese Salad
description: Fresh tomatoes with mozzarella and basil.
instructions: 1. Slice tomatoes and mozzarella. 2. Arrange alternately on a plate. 3. Drizzle with olive oil. 4. Season and add basil before serving.

name: Chicken Tortilla Soup
description: Spiced soup topped with crunchy strips.
instructions: 1. Cook onion and garlic in a pot. 2. Add tomato, broth, and chicken and simmer. 3. Shred chicken in the pot. 4. Serve topped with tortilla strips.

name: Saag Aloo
description: Potatoes cooked with spiced greens.
instructions: 1. Saut√© onion and garlic in oil. 2. Add spices and potatoes and cook briefly. 3. Add spinach and a little water. 4. Simmer until potatoes are tender.

name: Oyakodon
description: Chicken and egg over rice bowl.
instructions: 1. Simmer chicken and onion with soy sauce and sugar. 2. Pour beaten eggs over and cook gently. 3. Cook until eggs are just set. 4. Serve over hot rice.

name: Shrimp Po' Boy
description: Crispy shrimp in a soft sandwich roll.
instructions: 1. Dredge shrimp in seasoned flour. 2. Fry until golden and crisp. 3. Split rolls and add lettuce and tomato. 4. Fill with shrimp and sauce and serve.

name: Thai Pineapple Fried Rice
description: Sweet and savory rice with pineapple chunks.
instructions: 1. Stir-fry shrimp and egg in a pan. 2. Add rice and toss well. 3. Stir in pineapple, soy sauce, and cashews. 4. Garnish with scallions and serve.

name: Boeuf Bourguignon
description: Beef stewed slowly in red wine.
instructions: 1. Brown bacon and beef in a pot. 2. Add vegetables and cook briefly. 3. Pour in wine and add herbs and simmer slowly. 4. Cook until beef is tender and sauce is rich.

name: Army Stew
description: Hearty stew with sausage and kimchi.
instructions: 1. Bring broth to a simmer in a pot. 2. Add kimchi, sausages, and spam. 3. Add tofu and noodles and cook until tender. 4. Season with gochujang and serve.

name: Shrimp and Grits
description: Creamy grits topped with savory shrimp.
instructions: 1. Cook grits with water and butter until creamy. 2. Stir in cheddar and keep warm. 3. Saut√© bacon and garlic, then add shrimp. 4. Serve shrimp over grits and garnish.
